column1: '''Everholt''' was the name the [[Rohirrim]] gave to a section of the [[Firienholt|Firien Wood]]. It was notorious for its [[Boar of Everholt|boar]]
column2: after which the forest was named.<ref>{{App|Mark}}</ref>

column1: The name means "boar-wood". The first element comes from [[Old English]] ''eofor''
column2: "boar". The second element appears also in [[Dimholt]].
